Introduction: Introducing ourselves

We both have clinical backgrounds and one of the most common problems we face are that patients don’t visit eye care practioners till they have a certain visual discomfort or eye problem. The delay is usually because eye care consultation can be time consuming and usually of least priority. As everything is now available at doorstep, people usually look for easier and handy way to connect to care giver.

Most of patients do try to connect to their respective consultants through chat messages and video calls but they usually fail to connect or address the problem.

So, we both thought of building a platform that could connect the consumer to their consultants for better and easier eye care service.

Scope will be telemedicine application designed to meet the need of specialty clinics of eyecare. It will help eye doctors to get access to telehealth solutions to connect with their patients, providing them with accessible, consistent care at the moment of need. It will also help them to strengthen the patient relationship and ensure positive outcome. It will help patients keep in touch with their practionners even when they are unable to visit them personally

Scope is designed to save time for both consultant and patient. The main issue that we are trying to solve is to provide extra tests that are required to derive to a diagnosis. It will make monitoring patients' condition easier through regular virtual follow ups. This will also help patient maintain a database about their health reports and comprehensive medical history in a secure platform. Low vision aids training and rehabilitation can be provided. Relevant articles and blogs regarding their diagnosis will be provided

Why do we think this with different telemedicine application available in the market, the problem with recent applications are that they treat every specialty in the same way. Scope will deal with telemedicine solution exclusive to ocular health and management. It will connect the patient/ customer to Ophthalmologist, Optometrist and Opticians in a single platform. It will not only provide us with testing and consultation but also help with e-commerce of spectacles, contact lenses, sunglasses and other accessories . Questionnaires related to dry eye and contact lens will help practioners keep track of patients’ comfort.
name: Scope
